name: pinchflat
description: Pinchflat is a self-hosted tool for downloading, archiving, and managing YouTube videos. It supports scheduled downloads, playlists, and integration with media servers via a web UI.

features.title: Youtube Downloads
features.description: Download videos from YouTube channels, playlists, and individual URLs with configurable quality settings

features.title: Playlist Management
features.description: Subscribe to playlists and automatically download new videos as they're added

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organize downloads in formats compatible with Plex, Jellyfin, and other media servers

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Manage subscriptions, monitor downloads, and configure settings through a clean web UI

features.title: Storage Management
features.description: Set storage limits and automatically delete old videos to manage disk space
